Constructor Detail

NextXQueryFactory

public NextXQueryFactory(java.lang.String nextLinkName,
                         java.lang.String nextLinkPath)
                  throws BadDataException
Constructor that builds NextXQueryFactory objects

Parameters:
nextLinkName - value of text for next link or "image" keyword if non-textual
nextLinkPath - navigation-based XPath expression for next link
Throws:
BadDataException - in case of malformed XPath expression
